Title: Rockies OF Ian Desmond opts out of second straight season 'for now'
Description: Colorado Rockies outfielder Ian Desmond announced he will not play a second straight MLB season because of the COVID-19 pandemic. For now, I've decided to opt out of the 2021 season. Ian Desmond has announced that he is opting out of the 2021 season “for now.
Author: Yahoo! Sports on MSN.com
